Articles.Content:
Hello, just started playing yesterday and I have got to say great game, great community. Thanks to some really detailed tutorials and the KSP Calculator I have been able to enjoy a nice orbit round Kearth(?) that began about 20 mins ago.

I really cant wait to improve. Any tips at all would be great. It\'s great to meet you all
Welcome to the forums! Ignore all the posers who try and be a pirate like me, Capt\'n Luigi. =P

well done it took me ages to Figure out how to get an orbit going (back in 0.8.5)

Best Tip i could give you is don\'t Rush anything. other wise your little green dudes may be stuck in space for a very long time

other then that you seem to have the game all sorted.

heading to the moon?

Welcome to the forums! Ignore all the posers who try and be a pirate like me, Capt\'n Luigi. =P

Imposter! I be the true Pirate Sailing these sea\'s!

Arrr

Capt\'n Damonjay
Arrr! Ye be lyin\' the only two true pirates are me the Capt\'n and me first mate Skunky!

heading to the moon?

Some day I shall head to the moon but for now I have just settled for crash landing... luckily everyone survived somehow

This thread has been boarded it seems...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Some day I shall head to the moon but for now I have just settled for crash landing... luckily everyone survived somehow

well good work anyway

not long until you manage a Hoffman\'s Transfer to the moon.

This thread has been boarded it seems...

and there is your joke

Arrr! Ye be lyin\' the only two true pirates are me the Capt\'n and me first mate Spunky!

NARR! I Speak Not\'in but the Honest words of a Saint Himself. Curs\'ed Ye Imposters Black\'enin Capt\'n DamonJay\'s name. There only be enough Room for one True pirate on this Forum.

Your aged maiden be a Wench on the Streets of Tortuga
